## cdk-cloudfront-function-bundle package

Bundles multiple functions in a single CloudFront Function.

## Remarks

You can specify [BundledCode](./cdk-cloudfront-function-bundle.bundledcode.md) to the [code](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_cloudfront.Function.html#code) of [aws-cdk-lib.aws\_cloudfront.Function](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_cloudfront.Function.html)<!-- -->.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BundledCode](./cdk-cloudfront-function-bundle.bundledcode.md) | **_(BETA)_** [FunctionCode](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_cloudfront.FunctionCode.html) that bundles multiple functions in a single file. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [FunctionOptions](./cdk-cloudfront-function-bundle.functionoptions.md) | **_(BETA)_** Options of a component function. |
